org.apache.sis.referencing.factory.sql.SQLTranslator

Package
Description
org.apache.sis.referencing.factory.sql
Factories for geodetic objects defined in a SQL database, typically the EPSG dataset.

    EPSGDataAccess.translator
    The translator from the SQL statements using MS-Access dialect to SQL statements using the dialect of the actual database.
